lead_paragraph: West Ham United have confirmed they have initiated talks over extending midfielder Dimitri Payet's contract after manager Slaven Bilic said the 28-year-old's stellar form might force the club to offer him an improved deal.

headline.print_headline: West Ham Begin Contract Talks With Payet
headline.main: West Ham Begin Contract Talks With Payet
